body_html:
Yes, I follow instruction for installing from source from https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/os_setup
I made a wheel and then I install it by pip.
It seems some other guys have same problem here #2746.
I am reading it if i can use their solution.
Thanks

body:
Yes, I follow instruction for installing from source from https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/os_setup
I made a wheel and then I install it by pip.
It seems some other guys have same problem here https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/2746. 
I am reading it if i can use their solution. 
Thanks
